Description_lang: Casting Frostbolt$?a381244[, Ice Lance,][] or Flurry grants you an Icicle. Casting Ice Lance causes all Icicles stored to begin launching at the target, each dealing $148022s1 Frost damage.$?a379049[Frostbolt and Flurry have a $379049s2% chance to generate $379049s1 Icicles.][]Up to $s2 Icicles can be stored. Any excess Icicles gained will be automatically launched.Increases the damage of Frozen Orb, Blizzard,$?a443739[ Frost Splinters,][] and Comet Storm by $321684s1%.Increases the damage of Ice Lance, Glacial Spike, and Ray of Frost by $321684s2%.
